com.magicbinder.data

Class SQLiteAdapter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.magicbinder.data.base.SQLiteAdapterBase<T>
      • com.magicbinder.data.SQLiteAdapter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Entity type of this adapter.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Binder_CardSQLiteAdapterBase, BinderSQLiteAdapterBase, CardSQLiteAdapterBase, ColorSQLiteAdapterBase, ColortoCardSQLiteAdapterBase, QualitySQLiteAdapterBase

    public abstract class SQLiteAdapter<T>
extends SQLiteAdapterBase<T>
    This is the SQLiteAdapter. Feel free to add any generic custom method in here. This is the base class for all basic operations for your sqlite adapters.
